import React from "react"; const EditProfile = ( {person = { "firstName": 'Sunjit', "lastName": 'Dhillon', "handle": 'sunjit22', "profilePicture": '/images/profile_pic.jpg', "bannerPicture": '/images/cover_image.png', "bio": 'MS CS Grad Student, Aspiring Software Engineer, Microbiologist, Google CSRMP Scholar. Seeking internship/coop opportunities for summer 2022.', "website": 'linkedin.com/sunjit-dhillon', "location": 'Boston, MA', "dateOfBirth": '10/22/1995', "dateJoined": '4/2017', "followingCount": 312, "followersCount": 180, } }) => { return(
); } export default EditProfile;
